title: The Wolf's Huntress
description: Clara Richards is a Hunter for a Government organisation called The Order. When one mission goes wrong, and she's left for dead after being bitten, Clara must learn to live as a Lycan after a lifetime of hunting them. Caleb Daevers, the Alpha of the Ash Pack, find Clara a mystery. There has been no female Lycans for 50 years as The Order killed them all, so why has one of their own hunters become one? What makes Clara different?
author: Alessa Langley
